fields.description:
Readme.md has a complete command line example for building Hadoop on Windows.
However, that one doesn't work in the docker image, because that doesn't have full Visual Studio install, and misses the expected programs.

Add to README.md that the *-Dskip.platformToolsetDetection* maven option is needed when building from the docker image.

comments.body:
stoty opened a new pull request, #7600:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7600

   ### Description of PR
   
   The command lines for Windows in BULIDING.txt don't work.
   This fixes them so that they work out of the box in the Windows build Docker  image.
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   
   Ran the example command in the Windows build docker image
   
   ### For code changes:
   
   - [X] Does the title or this PR starts with the corresponding JIRA issue id (e.g. 'HADOOP-17799. Your PR title ...')?
   - [ ] Object storage: have the integration tests been executed and the endpoint declared according to the connector-specific documentation?
   - [ ] If adding new dependencies to the code, are these dependencies licensed in a way that is compatible for inclusion under [ASF 2.0](http://www.apache.org/legal/resolved.html#category-a)?
   - [ ] If applicable, have you updated the `LICENSE`, `LICENSE-binary`, `NOTICE-binary` files?

stoty commented on PR #7600:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7600#issuecomment-2796073693

   Found this while testing the Windows image @GauthamBanasandra .

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved
